map.comment: In the beginning, there was the world. Where natural processes created the basic materials needed to progress. These conversions represent those natural processes.

output.comment: Erroded by wind and water, sand is formed from the tiny particles of rock and mineral that make up the earth's crust.
Gravel is formed from the erosion of cobblestone by natural processes.
Cobblestone is formed when lava and water meet, cooling and solidifying the molten rock.

water.comment: Aquatic Conversions - These conversions involve water as a key component, representing processes that occur in aquatic environments.

output.comment: Sand is soaked in water to create clay

grindstone.comment: The most basic reperensentation of crushing. A grindstone is a simple tool that can be used to break down materials into their more basic forms.

smithing_table.comment: A workshop within a block; capable of upgrading hellish materials.

output.comment: Sticks are grinded down to form dust

dropper.comment: Though crude, this machine can contain the unpredictability of nature. Positive chances and negative chances, respectively, are calculated as such: ((100/negativeChance)*outputNum) = newOutputCount | ((postiveChance/100)*ingredientAmount) = newIngredientCount

output.comment: ((100/12%)*1) - Through hammer, forge, and labor story is written into steel. Its value transitions into wisdom.
((100/12%)*1) - The spines of the book begin to reach their end. The tome of knowledge is hardly valued for its luster.

dead_bush.comment: Dead bushes wash up on shorelines, they fill the void between land and sea. They are a reminder of the life that once was, and the life that will be again. These conversions deal with plantlife, and do not have workstations. Life is largely unexplained, and not predictable.

values.comment: The beginning of all things, the basic building blocks of life and matter. These are the fundamental definitions that make up the world.

before.comment: Abundantly neccessary. Flow, fill, and grow with it.
Liquid fire. Hot, molten rock. Can be found deep underground or in volcanic regions. All things that are born of fire, return to it.
